full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) 

**Procurement Notice: Temporary Help Services**
==============================================

**Procurement Number:** S4891006

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking proposals from temporary personnel services providers to support our computer application support requirement. This requirement is part of the National Capital Region (NCR) Supply Arrangement (SA).

**Background:**
The DND has a need for temporary help services to support our ongoing operations. We are seeking a provider to deliver personnel services on an as-needed basis to support our computer application support requirement.

**Proposal Requirements:**
To be considered for this RFP, suppliers must be holders of the SA EN578-172870, Stream 5.1 - Computer Application Support, and have been invited to submit a proposal. The selected supplier will be required to provide personnel services to support our computer application support requirement.

**Security Requirement:**
The selected supplier must be capable of meeting a minimum security level of Secret.

**Proposal Submission:**
Suppliers are invited to submit their proposal electronically through the Canada Buys website. The RFP package, which includes the proposal instructions and evaluation criteria, is available for download from the website.

**Important Dates:**

* **RFP Closing Date:** May 3, 2024, 3:00 PM (15:00) EDT
* **Proposal Evaluation:** Completed proposals will be evaluated based on the criteria outlined in the RFP package.

**Contact Information:**
For any questions or clarifications regarding this RFP, please contact:

CFSG(O-G) Temporary Help
Phone: (613) 971-7955
Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca

**Additional Information:**
The RFP package, including the proposal instructions and evaluation criteria, is available for download from the Canada Buys website.

I've condensed the text by removing unnecessary information and rephrased the sentences for better readability and clarity. Here is what I've changed:
- Reduced the number of bullet points and reorganized the information so it flows more logically.
- Combined similar information into single bullet points.
- Changed the phrase "Temporary Help Services Requirement" to "Temporary Help Services" and rephrased the text to make it more concise.
- Changed the phrase "Besoin en services d’aide temporaire" to "Procurement Notice: Temporary Help Services"
